response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item offers unparalleled benefits and features that cater to a wide range of needs, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its unique qualities and the extensive research and development that went into its creation, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $12,000. I trust that you will find its value exceeds the investment, and I look forward to the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
